items.sentence: Tom asked Mary to tell him why she was leaving him.
Tom asked me if I wanted to go to Boston with Mary.
Tom asked me to go to Boston with him next weekend.
Tom doesn\'t yet know where he\'s going to do that.
If Tom can help Mary, why can\'t he help John, too?
Tom told me that he\'s uncertain what he should do.
Tom doesn\'t want to have anything to do with Mary.
Tom didn\'t have anything to do with what happened.
I appreciate your problem, but it can\'t be helped.
Tom can always quit his job if he doesn\'t like it.
